name: Catnip Clicker
description:
Welcome to Catnip Clicker!
You can click on the catnip to get money to upgrade your auto growing farms!!!
You can change music through the radio
You can click the Calico head to get random words from me.

To Play on Browser go to: https://flowlab.io/game/play/1480292

Controls:
M: Go back to Menu
Left and Right Arrow: Music channels
Up Arrow: Up
Down Arrow: Down
Left Click: interact
